tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_vulnerabilities (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	vulnerability_name VARCHAR,
	description TEXT,
	detection_timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE monitoring_tools (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	tool_name VARCHAR,
	vendor_name VARCHAR,
	license_key VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tool_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (tool_id) REFERENCES tools(id),
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    last_check TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE detection_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    monitored_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (monitored_id) REFERENCES monitoring(id),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE monitoring (
   monitoring_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   tool_id INT,
   monitoring_tool VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   monitoring_interval INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (tool_id) REFERENCES tools(tool_id)
);

CREATE TABLE detection (
   detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   monitoring_id INT,
   vulnerability_id INT,
   detection_time TIMESTAMP,
   FOREIGN KEY (monitoring_id) REFERENCES monitoring(monitoring_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerabilities(vulnerability_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
   alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   detection_id INT,
   alert_message TEXT NOT NULL,
   alert_time TIMESTAMP,
   FOREIGN KEY (detection_id) REFERENCES detection(detection_id)
);
